addon.name: XOT-Uzg.v3 Modern Time Group (Swedish, Lithuanian and Letvian) Channels

extension.summary: XOT-Uzg.v3 is a plugin/script that allows the playback of a lot of TV shows that are available (legally) via the broadcasters websites.
extension.description: Set of Swedish, Letvian and Lithuanian channels for XOT-Uzg.v3
